Affliction.name: Strange Growth
Affliction.description: Something terrible is happening...

Affliction.name: Egg Random
Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.name: SCP-280 Hunt Starter
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe paranoia.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: SCP-087 has teleported into you, killing you instantly.

Affliction.name: SCP-280 Hunt
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe paranoia.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: SCP-087 has teleported into you, killing you instantly.

Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe paranoia.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: SCP-087 has teleported into you, killing you instantly.

Affliction.name: Horribler Feeling
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe paranoia.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: SCP-087 has teleported into you, killing you instantly.

Affliction.name: Demanifestation
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe paranoia.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: SCP-087 has teleported into you, killing you instantly.

Affliction.name: Darkness
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You've been mangled to death by 280.

Affliction.name: Touched by 049
Affliction.description: All biological functions within the patient stopped working.
Affliction.causeofdeathdescription: All Biological functions stopped working suddenly.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: SCP-049 has cured you.

Affliction.name: Contagion Starter
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: (Functional Necrosis Syndrome) Temporary Dormant Viral Particles
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: (Functional Necrosis Syndrome) Dormant Viral Particles
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: Staggering
Affliction.description: The patient struggles to walk.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: Armed
Affliction.description: Arming humans with guns

Affliction.name: Inert
Affliction.description: Keeps the flesh unconscious for a second so that people have time to GTFO when someone turns.

Affliction.name: SCP-610 Infection Manager
Affliction.description: Check eligibility for SCP-610 infection.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: you were micromanaged to death?

AfflictionHusk.name: Spreading Red Rash
AfflictionHusk.description: There's a nasty rash festering throughout your body. Its only a matter of time...
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by the Red Rash.

AfflictionHusk.name: Wrapping Chains
AfflictionHusk.description: SCP-1770 has you in its grip!
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been choked to death.

AfflictionHusk.name: 008placeholder
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by the Red Rash.

Affliction.name: Mutagenic Skin Disease
Affliction.description: Several sores and scars are present on the torso and rapidly spreading to the other limbs.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You melted into a flesh monster due to SCP-610.

Affliction.name: Rash Infection Contagion
Affliction.description: There are dangerous airborne instances of SCP-610 around the environment. A protective suit is highly recommended in this conditions.

Affliction.name: Festering Flesh
Affliction.description: The flesh of SCP-610 is rapidly multiplying, producing more SCP-610 instances.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You melted into a flesh monster due to SCP-610.

Affliction.name: Storage
Affliction.description: The monster is carrying some things!

Affliction.name: Fake death
Affliction.description: It's not really dead!

Affliction.name: Fake death
Affliction.description: It's not really dead!

Affliction.name: Damaged
Affliction.description: The monster is DAMAGED. Becomes slower and has less health.

Affliction.name: Randomness
Affliction.description: This affliction is like, totally random.

Affliction.name: Attacked
Affliction.description: Something that has to do with attacking.

Affliction.name: Attacked2
Affliction.description: Something that has to do with attacking. Only for spiders.

Affliction.name: Open
Affliction.description: You're about to release some spiders, mate.

Affliction.name: Progress
Affliction.description: Something is progressing.

Affliction.name: 1499 Teleportation
Affliction.description: The mask is on.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were teleported to another dimension, never to be found again.

AfflictionHusk.name: 323 Infection
AfflictionHusk.description: The last thing you ever see.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have been taken over by the Skull.

Affliction.name: Wendigo Mutation
Affliction.description: The corpse being piloted by the skull begins to evolve...

Affliction.name: SCP-008 Manager
Affliction.description: The patient is suffering.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: SCP-008 Infection
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: hasvomited
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: SCP-008 Vomit
Affliction.description: The patient is vomiting up their insides.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: Is a zombie
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe paranoia.

Affliction.name: Dormant 008
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have neurodegenerated into a zombie.

Affliction.name: Infectious Cough
Affliction.description: Abbandonate ogni speranza voi che entrate qui.

Affliction.name: Lethargy
Affliction.description: Subject is feeling sleepy
